page.title: 04Population
page.content: From our survey we discovered that 134 adults live in this area and there are only 17 children of school age who attend the following schools-Chale C.E.Primary-2,Ventnor Middle-3, Nodehill Middle-4,Newport C.E.Middle-2 Medina High-1,Carisbrooke High-2,Ryde School(Private)-3. Several of them work on local farms either in this area or in other places on the Island.Others work outside the area in Printing,Boatbuilding,Offices, Teaching and in the Army.One person commutes to London two days a week. Seasonal work for women particularly can be obtained at Atherfield Holiday Camp.There is also a self-employed Fisherman and an Electrical Contractor.People moved into this area because its quiet and unspoilt,much less tourism than other parts of the island,some had family connections.
